alert.note: Alert for Lincoln (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 18 at 3:30PM CDT until May 18 at 4:00PM CDT by NWS Huntsville
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 400 PM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN MADISON AND SOUTHWESTERN LINCOLN COUNTIES... At 330 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles east of Ardmore, or 10 miles northwest of Meridianville, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Taft, Blanche and Elkwood. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
